How extensive is your organized raiding experience? The more details the better

Regularly full-cleared MC and Ony with organized world buffs and prep for PvP at raid entrances to avoid losing buffs as our server is a horde-dominated pvp server. In retail I raid mythic at a decently high level.
Do you have parses on warcraftlogs? If so, please provide a link.
What do you think is more important for a successful PvE progression guild: attitude or skill? Why?

Attitude. The most skilled player won't excel if any mistake they or others make sets them off and hurts their performance. A player with a good attitude is more willing to adjust to what the raid needs from them, mechanically and performance-wise.
When are your usual playtimes? What occupies the bulk of your time in-game? (PvP, PvE, RP, etc.)
Typically available in the evenings. Enjoyed a decent amount of wpvp before ranks came out and due to my server type, but mostly into pve.
We are on an RP-PvE server, but as a guild, we do not participate in RP. Is this in any way an issue?
